com.github.zk1931.jzab

Class MessageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.zk1931.jzab.MessageBuilder

  • public final class MessageBuilder
extends Object
    Helper class used for creating protobuf messages.

                                      int syncTimeoutMs)
        Creates a NEW_EPOCH message.
        Parameters:
        epoch - the new proposed epoch number.
        syncTimeoutMs - the timeout for synchronization.
        Returns:
        the protobuf message.

      • buildAckEpoch

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildAckEpoch(long epoch,
                               Zxid lastZxid)
        Creates a ACK_EPOCH message.
        Parameters:
        epoch - the last leader proposal the follower has acknowledged.
        lastZxid - the last zxid of the follower.
        Returns:
        the protobuf message.

      • buildInvalidMessage

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildInvalidMessage(byte[] content)
        Creates an INVALID message. This message will not be transmitted among workers. It's created when protobuf fails to parse the byte buffer.
        Parameters:
        content - the byte array which can't be parsed by protobuf.
        Returns:
        a message represents an invalid message.

      • buildPullTxnReq

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildPullTxnReq(Zxid lastZxid)
        Creates a PULL_TXN_REQ message to ask follower sync its history to leader.
        Parameters:
        lastZxid - the last transaction id of leader, the sync starts one after this transaction (not including this one).
        Returns:
        a protobuf message.

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildProposal(Transaction txn)
        Creates a PROPOSAL message.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a protobuf message.

                               String clientId)

        Parameters:

        a protobuf message.

      • buildFlush

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildFlush(Zxid lastProposedZxid,
                            ByteBuffer body)
        Creates a FLUSH message.
        Parameters:
        lastProposedZxid - the last proposed zxid before the FLUSH.
        body - the data of the request.
        Returns:
        a protobuf message.

      • buildSyncHistory

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildSyncHistory(Zxid lastZxid)
        Creates a SYNC_HISTORY message. Leader will synchronize everything it has to follower after receiving this message.

      • buildSyncHistoryReply

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildSyncHistoryReply(int timeout)
        Creates the SYNC_HISTORY_REPLY message. It's the first time to tell the joiner the synchronization timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        a protobuf message.

      • buildElectionInfo

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildElectionInfo(String vote,
                                   Zxid lastZxid,
                                   long ackEpoch,
                                   long round,
                                   boolean electing)
        Creates the ELECTION_INFO message.
        Parameters:
        vote - the server who is selected as the leader.
        lastZxid - the last zxid of the selected leader.
        round - the round number.
        electing - true if current server is in electing phase, false otw.
        Returns:
        a protobuf message.
